import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import products from "../assets/data/products"; import Helmet from "../components/Helmet/Helmet"; import CommonSection from "../components/UI/CommonSection"; import "../styles/product-details.css"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import ProductList from "../components/UI/ProductList"; const ProductDetails = () => { const [tab, setTab] = useState("desc"); const [rating, setRating] = useState(null); const { id } = useParams(); const product = products.find(item => item.id === id); const { imgUrl, productName, price, avgRating, reviews, description, category, shortDesc, } = product; const relatedProducts = products.filter(item => item.category === category); return (
